statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_history;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transaction_history;
SELECT transaction_date, amount, status FROM transaction_history WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount FROM transaction_history ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_history GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, status FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transaction_history WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT account_id, customer_id, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT description, activity_date FROM suspicious_activity WHERE activity_type = 'Fraudulent' ORDER BY activity_date;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_amount LIMIT 10;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM transaction_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_amount > 5000 ORDER BY avg_amount DESC;

SELECT th.transaction_id, th.transaction_date, sa.activity_type FROM transaction_history th JOIN suspicious_activity sa ON th.transaction_id = sa.transaction_id WHERE sa.description LIKE '%fraud%' ORDER BY th.transaction_date DESC, sa.activity_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history th INNER JOIN suspicious_activity sa ON th.transaction_id = sa.transaction_id WHERE th.account_id = 12345 AND sa.activity_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT th.transaction_id, th.transaction_amount, th.transaction_date, COUNT(sa.activity_id) AS num_activities FROM transaction_history th LEFT JOIN suspicious_activity sa ON th.transaction_id = sa.transaction_id GROUP BY th.transaction_id, th.transaction_amount, th.transaction_date HAVING num_activities >= 2 ORDER BY th.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY date DESC, amount ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT account_name, account_balance FROM accounts WHERE account_balance < 0;
SELECT activity_type, activity_description FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Fraud';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, description FROM transactions WHERE DATE(date) = CURDATE() AND description LIKE '%fraud%';
SELECT account_name, account_balance FROM accounts WHERE account_balance < 0;
SELECT description, amount, date FROM transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC, date DESC;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Suspicious' AND activity_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY activity_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE account_id = 1;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE is_suspicious = TRUE;
SELECT action, action_date, user_id, details FROM audit_logs ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, account_id FROM transactions WHERE is_suspicious = TRUE;
SELECT action, action_date, details FROM audit_logs ORDER BY action_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY datetime DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT amount, datetime FROM transactions WHERE account_id = 1001 AND status = 'approved';
SELECT customer_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, activity_description FROM fraud_activities WHERE date_detected = '2022-01-15';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY datetime DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT amount, account_id, status FROM transactions WHERE account_id = 100 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, t.datetime, a.customer_name FROM transactions t INNER JOIN accounts a ON t.account_id = a.account_id WHERE t.status = 'pending' ORDER BY t.datetime DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT f.activity_id, f.activity_description, t.amount, t.datetime FROM fraud_activities f INNER JOIN transactions t ON f.transaction_id = t.transaction_id ORDER BY f.date_detected DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT u.username, u.role, s.reason, s.detected_on FROM users u INNER JOIN suspicious_transactions s ON u.user_id = s.transaction_id;
